original: Thrombosis of the lower extremities' veins, commonly known as deep vein thrombosis (DVT), is a serious medical condition characterized by the formation of blood clots in the veins of the legs or pelvis. This condition can lead to various complications, including a potentially life-threatening condition known as a pulmonary embolism. Therefore, it is crucial to understand its symptoms, causes, diag
